sourcesContent:
Evento dos Componentes

Tema: {{ evento.Tema }}

Local: {{ evento.Local }}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {HttpClient} from "@angular/common/http" @Component({ selector: 'app-Eventos', templateUrl: './Eventos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./Eventos.component.scss'] }) export class EventosComponent implements OnInit { public eventos: any; constructor( private http: HttpClient) { } ngOnInit() { this.getEventos(); } public getEventos() : void { this.http.get('') this.eventos = [ { Tema: 'Angular 11', Local: 'BH' }, { Tema: '.NET 5', Local: 'SP' }, { Tema: 'Angular & News', Local: 'RJ' }]; } }
